page.title: 12Fruit Farms
page.content: There used to be a lot of orchard around Ulcombe but over the years there has been a{steady decline}as orchards have been torn out and ploughed up for use as barly fields.There are still a lot of apple and cherry orchards around but not as many as there used to be.As well as apples and cherries there are strawberries,rasberries,logonberries, kob nuts,hazel nuts,cultivated blackberries,red currants and black currants.{Loganberries, rasberries, {black currants and red currants}are usually not grown on large farms but on small-holdings.Around us there are {quite a lot of small-holdings and {nurseries}which sell fresh fruit and plants. { } At the local farm they sell pick your own and sometimes allready picked apples and strawberries.
